report.sql: SELECT e.course, date_format(e.certification_time,"%M %Y") as date, count(e.enrollment_id) as count FROM enrollments e WHERE e.certification_time IS NOT NULL AND [course] AND [date_min] AND [date_max] GROUP BY year(e.certification_time), month(e.certification_time), e.course ORDER BY year(e.certification_time) DESC, month(e.certification_time) DESC, e.course
